name: First Fantasy (rob11games)
description:
A 25 minutes-long turn based RPG adventure. You first start as Billie, a huntress that is tracking a group of orcs causing trouble in her beloved forest. Fight dangerous creatures, find friends to help you on your journey and unlock powerful abilities.

This game is meant to be completed in one sitting, so no save system has been implemented.

I am a learning programmer who made this game as a school project and I am actively looking for feedbacks. Don't hesitate to drop a comment !

Dangerous foes !
